Package com.readytalk.swt.effects

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FadeEffect.Fadeable
    Classes that need to implement a FadeEffect must implement this interface.
    FadeEffect.FadeCallback
    Implementers of this interface are called when a FadeEffect completes.
    LinkableEffect.Executor  
    ResizeEffect.Resizeable
    Classes that need to implement a ResizeEffect must implement this interface.
    ResizeEffect.ResizeCallback
    Implementers of this interface are called when a ResizeEffect completes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FadeEffect
    A roll-your-own fade effect.
    FadeEffect.FadeEffectBuilder
    Builder used to create and customize a FadeEffect.
    LinkableEffect  
    LinkableEffect.EffectAbortedCallback
    Implementers of this class are intended to be invoked when an Effect is successfully aborted.
    ResizeEffect
    A roll-your-own resize.
    ResizeEffect.ResizeEffectBuilder
    Builder used to create and customize a ResizeEffect.
    Note: You need to either provide a current/target Size (or Height, Width), Location (or X, Y) or Bounds for the Effect to do anything useful.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidEffectArgumentException
    Thrown when you don't provide all required (or invalid) arguments to an EffectBuilder.
